com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone
Class PreferenceWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.DizWARE.ShuffleTone.PreferenceWriter

public class PreferenceWriter
extends java.lang.Object

This class basically shortens the amount of work needed to store stuff within a SharedPreference. When you use SharedPrferences all the time, this is a huge time/code saver

Author:
Tydiz

stringWriter

public static void stringWriter(SharedPreferences pref,
                                java.lang.String valueName,
                                java.lang.String whatToStore)
Writes the data, whatToStore, under the reference, valueName, into the given preference; Specifically strings

Parameters:
pref - - Settings file we are trying to add data to
valueName - - Reference name of the value we are storing
whatToStore - - Data we are putting in the preference file
